Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class Hotel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotelapplication.backend.Hotel
  • public class Hotel
extends Object
    The Hotel class represents a hotel with attributes like hotel ID, name, rooms, address, and reservations. It provides methods to manage hotel information, rooms, and reservations.
    Author:
    Alexander Boutselis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Hotel​(int hotelID, String hotelName, String address)
      Constructs a new Hotel object with the given ID, name, and address.
      Hotel​(String hotelName, String address)
      Constructs a new Hotel object with the given name and address.
